local_intent: Perform the grasp at the computed goal_pose using a pinch strategy, then verify object capture and grasp stability.
assumptions: goal_pose was previously computed and available on the blackboard
Target remains reachable and unobstructed at grasp time
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan by using the computed goal_pose, executing GraspAtPose with pinch, closing gripper with force 15, and verifying ObjectInGripper followed by IsGraspStable.
